targets.expr:
((temperatureProbeReading{hostname="$node"}/10) + on (temperatureProbeIndex) group_left(temperatureProbeLocationName) (temperatureProbeLocationName{temperatureProbeIndex="3"}))
or 
((temperatureProbeReading{hostname="$node"}/10) + on (temperatureProbeIndex) group_left(temperatureProbeLocationName) (temperatureProbeLocationName{temperatureProbeIndex="4"}))
or 
((temperatureProbeReading{hostname="$node"}/10) + on (temperatureProbeIndex) group_left(temperatureProbeLocationName) (temperatureProbeLocationName{temperatureProbeIndex="5"}))
or 
((temperatureProbeReading{hostname="$node"}/10) + on (temperatureProbeIndex) group_left(temperatureProbeLocationName) (temperatureProbeLocationName{temperatureProbeIndex="6"}))

((temperatureProbeReading{hostname="$node"}/10) + on (temperatureProbeIndex) group_left(temperatureProbeLocationName) (temperatureProbeLocationName{temperatureProbeLocationName="System Board Inlet Temp"})) or ((temperatureProbeReading{hostname="$node"}/10) + on (temperatureProbeIndex) group_left(temperatureProbeLocationName) (temperatureProbeLocationName{temperatureProbeLocationName="System Board Exhaust Temp"}))

(physicalDiskCapacityInMB{hostname="$node"}) + on (physicalDiskNumber) group_left(physicalDiskDisplayName) (physicalDiskDisplayName{hostname="$node"}) + on (physicalDiskNumber) group_left(physicalDiskProductID) (physicalDiskProductID{hostname="$node"})  + on (physicalDiskNumber) group_left(physicalDiskSerialNo) (physicalDiskSerialNo{hostname="$node"})
